name: armor-fossil
effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive a shieldon.
short_effect: Can be revived into a Shieldon.

flavor_text.black-white: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a collar.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a collar.
